alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:41AM AKST until December 27 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and freezing rain occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch, and ice accumulations less than one tenth of an inch are expected. Over Steese and Dalton Highway Summits, visibility will be one half mile or less in blowing snow. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Until noon today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will occur south of Circle. Snow will occur to the north. Over Steese and Dalton Highway Summits, west winds gusting to 35 mph are causing low visibility in blowing snow and heavy drifting snow. Winds, blowing snow and freezing rain will decrease this afternoon and conditions will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
